content: this is the ad-free easy to print pdf version of this pattern you can find the free pattern here https //theturtletrunk com/farmhouse-table-runner-crochet-pattern/ the farmhouse table runner is an easy crochet table runner pattern perfect for gifting selling or using in your own home it features a beautiful texture and border using easy crochet stitches make in any number of colors and easily adjust the size pattern includes -detailed instructions for a crochet table runner -link to free video tutorial -gauge difficulty advanced beginner finished size 12 x 56 supplies needed 722 yards of medium 4 weight cotton yarn 5 00mm h hook yarn needle and scissors standard us crochet terms
